short_summary: This is a Notice of Proposed Procurement.
description: The department of fisheries and oceans Canada(DFO) has a requirement for up to two senior-level Learning Advisors to aid with training strategy development, and up to three senior-level Learning Designers to aid with curriculum development and delivery on an as and when required basis.\nOnly one of each senior-level resource type (learning advisor and learning designer) must be proposed for bid evaluation purposes.\nTo ensure the safety and efficacy of all Fishery Officers and Guardians, DFO aims to modernize the Fishery Officer Initial Training (FOIT) program, as well as develop and formalize a Guardian Training programs.
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
full_summary:
===

**Government Tender Announcement: Guardian Training Program and Fishery Officer Initial Training**

**Reference Number:** cb-167-4293743

**Date:** 2024-02-02

**Closing Date:** 2024-02-26T14:00:00

**Contract Period:** March 1, 2024 to February 26, 2027

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the Guardian Training Program and Fishery Officer Initial Training. The Contracting Entity is DFO, with the project covering a wide range of educational and training services in Canada.

**Services Required:**

* Senior Learning Advisors: Up to two (2) senior-level experts will be required to aid in training strategy development for Fishery Officers and Guardians.
* Senior Learning Designers: Up to three (3) senior-level experts will be required to aid in curriculum development and delivery for Fishery Officer Initial Training (FOIT) and Guardian Training programs.

**Key Objectives:**

* To modernize the Fishery Officer Initial Training (FOIT) program
* To develop and formalize a Guardian Training program
* To ensure the safety and efficacy of all Fishery Officers and Guardians

**Duration and Location:**

* Contract duration: March 1, 2024 to February 26, 2027
* Location of work: Ottawa and elsewhere in Canada

**Eligibility:**

* This requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders under EN60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under Tier 1 for the following categories:
	- Senior Learning Advisor
	- Senior Learning Designer

**Procedure:**

* Suppliers who are SA-holders must email the DFO Procurement Officer on the file and request to be invited.
* Suppliers who are not SA-holders must contact PSPC's SA Authority for the TSPS SA to be added for future opportunities.

**Important Contact Information:**

* Contact Person: Richard Soulliere
* Email: DFO.Tenders-Soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 576-2873

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
